Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed all expectations. This exceptional item holds immense value to us, representing years of innovation and dedication to quality. We are offering this remarkable piece to you at a special introductory price of $1200000. This is an exclusive opportunity to own a masterpiece that could potentially be worth far more in the future. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this proposal. Best regards, Alice. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,200,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,200,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,500,000
